name: Anti-Gravity (Ilkin10)
description:
First Part of Game I make. Called Anti-Gravity

Parkour  Game but not ordinary, upside-down parkouring. Easy to Play and Easy to Win. 

Basic FPS Parkour Game. If you like please Share your thoughts to make game better.

Also Try Speedrun and compete against your friends.

Gameplay:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Accelerate

Esc - Menu

(Game Supports Gamepad, but not entirely)

Please Enjoy:)

Credits for Music:

"man-is-he-mega" Music by GeoffreyBurch from Pixabay, "let-the-games-begin" Music by Psychronic from Pixabay.
